Strings.String: Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014 (x64)
Administrator permissions are required to install Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014. Contact your administrator.
Installation of Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014 requires Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5. Contact your application vendor.
Due to an error with Windows Installer, the installation of Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014 cannot proceed.
Another instance of setup is already running. The running instance must complete before this setup can proceed.

A beta version of Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014 was detected on the computer. Uninstall any previous beta versions of Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014 before continuing.
A failure occurred attempting to install Microsoft® System CLR Types for SQL Server® 2014.
